tasks.label: Build and push custom che-operator image: '${IMAGE_REGISTRY_HOST}/${IMAGE_REGISTRY_USER_NAME}/che-operator:nightly'
Port-forward che-server debug
tasks.command: kubectl patch checluster eclipse-che -n che --type=merge -p '{"spec":{"server":{"cheDebug": "true"}}}' || true && chePod=$(kubectl get pods -n che -o yaml | yq -r ".items[] | select(.metadata.name | startswith(\"che\") and (startswith(\"che-operator\") | not)) | .metadata.name") && echo ${chePod} | kubectl port-forward --namespace che pod/${chePod} 5005:8000
